functional_requirements.module_reference: Section 2.4 Scope of Work - Report Generation, Page 8

functional_requirements.description: The system shall provide 24x7 online technical support as part of support and maintenance services
The system shall categorize incidents based on their severity level and provide response, restoration, and remedy procedures
The system shall support problem management procedures and escalation matrix
The system shall provide timely backup of the entire database to meet system recovery challenges in case of disaster or missing data
The system shall provide monthly support and maintenance log reports
The system shall display dashboard with dynamic data in reports using table and graphic presentations
The system shall support Bengali UNICODE enabled font so that Bengali content can be viewed properly from any machine supporting Unicode
The system shall facilitate content display in both English and Bengali languages

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall use Open Source Development Platform
The system shall be developed using PHP-based platform with Bootstrap tool architecture, frameworks like CakePHP/Laravel/CodeIgniter, and MySQL database
The system shall support future technology changes, iterative prototyping, and agility in product design
The system shall ensure access control and application level security
The system shall implement role-wise credential system for better user role management
The system shall encrypt user IDs and passwords and impose minimum password lengths with ability to reset passwords following standard password strategy
The system shall provide provision for periodical and instant data backup with auto archiving system
The system shall be cross-browser compatible, responsive, and graphically attractive
The system shall be tested at module integration and load level with all necessary security tests at application level architecture
non_functional_requirements.validation_metrics: Integration testing, load testing, security testing

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall be compatible with all well-known browsers of Desktop, Laptop, and smart devices
The system shall provide seamless external software communication interface with priority on user experience
The system shall support microservice architecture for better testability, deployability, and fault isolation
non_functional_requirements.validation_metrics: Architecture review and service independence testing

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall enable continuous delivery and deployment of large, complex applications
The system shall provide improved fault isolation where memory leaks in one service only affect that service
The system shall eliminate long-term commitment to technology stack by allowing new technology adoption for new services
The system shall support Linux server OS, Windows workstation, and specified development tools and frameworks
